CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(Check_In_Date__c), ISBLANK(Check_Out_Date__c), ISBLANK(Property__r.Rent__c) ), NULL, IF( ISPICKVAL(Property__r.Rent_Type__c, "Per Night"), (Check_Out_Date__c - Check_In_Date__c) * Property__r.Rent__c, ROUND( ((Check_Out_Date__c - Check_In_Date__c) / 30) * Property__r.Rent__c, 2 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Total Rent
